alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Columbia, east central Greene and south central Rensselaer Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Athens, or near Hudson, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hudson, Catskill, Chatham, Coxsackie, New Lebanon, Valatie, Athens, Kinderhook, Lorenz Park, Ghent, Stockport, Canaan, Richmond, East Nassau, Jacks Corners, Rossman, Rayville, Riders Mills, Brick Tavern and Fitchs Wharf. This includes Interstate 87 near exit 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
